reviewText: 1988 TV Movie Documentary as seen on HBO.  155min film documents  exhaustive research to reveal new facts on the shrouded past of Austria's President and former secretary General of the United Nations, Kurt Waldheim. This commission of inquiry examines evidence gathered by 24 investigators in an 11 country sweep-evidence available to the public for the first time. Two legal teams present and challenge the evidence before a panel of five prominent international judges, in search of an answer to the question. Should Kurt Waldheim stand trial as a war criminal? Released on VHS by HBO Video. WALDHEIM A Commission of Inquiry
